availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pennsylvania native. Married to Susan Caroline Smith Williams on November 20, 1842 in Jefferson County, Kentucky. Father Of John W., Kate, Mary, and Sue Williams. Gas works engineer in Louisville, Kentucky in 1850. Gas fitter in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Owned Thomas Williams & Company in Louisville, Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 7, p. 357A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 7, p. 469.
Find A Grave, "Thomas Williams (1813-1864)," Memorial #182703852, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/182703852 (accessed August 20, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707.
